data.title: About Kamal Haasan Horoscope
data.meta_description: Read the full detail About Kamal Haasan, Famous Film Actor Horoscope Analysis in the following astrological observation.
data.meta_site_name: Astrology, Horoscope, Online Astrology Service, Astrologer
data.text:
Here Is What Our Astrological Analysis Says About Kamal Haasan

About Actor Kamal Haasan

Kamal Haasan is a veteran Indian celebrity known for his versatile personalities as a film actor, dancer, producer, scriptwriter, dancer, lyricist, movie producer, playback singer and politician. He was born as Parthasarathy Srinivasan on November 07 in the year 1954. He holds a charismatic persona in Tamil cinema for his sheer level of dedication for his cinematic performance, going an extra mile to justify a role to its realistic manifestation on silver screen. He is the recipient of several honorary awards, some of which include 19 Filmfare Awards for his cinematic performance. He directed several movies under the banner of his home production company known as Raaj Kamal Films International. Kamal Haasan, Famous Film Actor also does social-service activities through welfare organizations under Kamal NarpaniIyakkam donating educational materials to needy students and contributing support for blood- and eye-donation drives.

At PavitraJyotish, we are conducting an astrological analysis on the life of Kamal Haasan in the narrative as indicated in the following Horoscope chart.

Birth Details of Kamal Haasan are as per given below:

Date of Birth: November 07, 1954, Birth Day: Sunday, Birth Time: 06:15:00, Birth Place: Paramakudi, Tamil Nadu, India

Astrological Highlights

Kamal Haasan, Famous Film Actor born with Libra Ascendant. Exalted Saturn and debilitated Sun along with retrograde Mercury are posited in the Ascendant (First house). Ruler of the Ascendant Venus is in retrogression and is in a fix natured water sign measured as highly passionate Scorpio Zodiac Sign in the second house. Exalted Mars is in the fourth house, in opposition to exalted Jupiter positioned in the tenth house. Ruler of the tenth house Moon is in Pisces and placed in the sixth house. In this way, Moon and Jupiter are exchanging signs. Malefic shadow planets Rahu – Ketu is in Sagittarius and Gemini Zodiac Sign respectively and positioned in the third and the ninth house respectively.

According to Bhava Chalit, Venus shifts into the first house, Mercury into the 12th house and Moon shifts into the fifth house.

Saturn, Mars, and Jupiter are exalted in the birth chart.

In D9 chart, Sun gets exalted and Moon is in own sign Cancer.

Effect of transitory planets in ensuing years

Kamal Haasan Birth Chart Analysis

Saturn is measured as a most favorable planet for Libra Ascendant. During years 2018 – 2019 Saturn Transit in a dual-natured last of a fire sign, optimistic by nature Sagittarius through the third house. During transit through Sagittarius Saturn is to cross over natal Rahu posited therein. Transiting Saturn views the fifth, the ninth and the 12th house. This can lead to unexpected expenses here. New relationships are to develop. However, Kamal, Superstar of Tamil Cinema needs to trade cautiously in a new relationship. Change in the equation in old relationships is also envisioned here. Crack in an emotional relationship is envisaged during transit of Saturn through the third house. This transit period of Saturn in Sagittarius seems much eventful time for Parathasarathi Srinivasan (Kamal Haasan).

From around March 2019 shadow planet Ketu enters Sagittarius and joins Saturn already moving therein. This movement of Ketu –Saturn can prove a kind of trying time for Kamal Haasan, Famous Film Actor and Politician. He needs to trade much cautiously in a new relationship. Kamal, Tamil Superstar Kamal Haasan needs to handle issues much tactfully and keep his cool.

Movement of malefic Rahu in Cancer over natal Jupiter does not sound good for his well being in general. Health issue if any needs to be treated promptly with due remedial measures. This can work well in stopping the issue from getting escalating further.

From around May 2018 until the beginning of October aggressive Mars moves through its sign of exaltation Capricorn through the fourth house. Now Mars repeats its own radical position. Viewing this, the movement of Mars in Capricorn carries much importance. Exalted Mars moves in direct opposition to natal Jupiter positioned in the tenth house. Viewing this Kamal Haasan, Tamil Superstar Kamal Haasan, Famous Film Actor carries the risk of getting physically injured unexpectedly. He needs to take due care in this regard. He is to strive hard to make his presence felt on political front here. He is to achieve success on this count.

From around August 2018 until the end of the year Venus traverses in its own sign Libra through the first house. This movement of Venus in own sign through the first house is to increase in acceptance level for him. His utterances are to be welcomed by masses in general. He is to carry more weight in the political circle. Some major important relationships are to come into existence. In turn, this enhances his prospects at all level.

During years 2018 -19 Jupiter moves through Libra and Scorpio for the most part of the time. Now Jupiter moves through the first house till around October 2018. In turn, Jupiter crosses over the natal position of debilitated Sun, exalted Saturn and retrograde Mercury positioned in the first house. This is to work well in strengthening his position on the political front. Then Jupiter shifts into a fix natured water sign Scorpio. Now Jupiter crosses over natal retrograde Venus. Some political heavyweights are to join his party here. Acceptability level for his efforts on the political front is to enhance.

In short amid some adversity, Kamal Haasan, Famous Film Actor is to prove a point and make his presence felt on the political front is to be commendable during years 2018-19, Pavitra Jyotish analyses.
